title: SignalK Delta message schema
description: Schema for defining updates and subscriptions to parts of a SignalK data model, for example for communicating updates of data

context.description: The context path of the updates, eg. the top level path plus object identifier.

path.description: The local path to the data value
The relative path of the subscription,  supports jsonPath syntax for complex matches

period.description: The period to repeat the message in millisecs

format.description: The message format for periodic messages

policy.description: The policy rules for repetition. [instant]=send all changes as fast as they are received, but no faster than minPeriod. [ideal]=use instant policy, but send the value every `period` millisecs anyway, whether changed or not. [fixed]=send the last known values every period.

minPeriod.description: The the fastest message transmission rate allowed, e.g. every `minPeriod/1000` seconds.

path.description: The relative path to unsubscribe,  supports jsonPath syntax for complex matches

period.description: The period to repeat the message in millisecs

format.description: The message format for periodic messages

policy.description: The policy rules for repetition. [instant]=send all changes as fast as they are received, but no faster than minPeriod. [ideal]=use instant policy, but send the value every `period` millisecs anyway, whether changed or not. [fixed]=send the last known values every period.

minPeriod.description: The the fastest message transmission rate allowed, e.g. every `minPeriod/1000` seconds.

get.description: A websockets equivalent to a REST GET request.This is for one-off requests, use the subscribe message for regular changes.

path.description: The relative path to GET,  supports jsonPath syntax for complex matches

list.description: Gets a list of known keys for this path

path.description: The relative path to list keys for,  supports jsonPath syntax for complex matches

put.description: A websockets equivalent to a REST PUT request. This is for one-off changes, use the updates message for regular changes.

value.description: The value to set at the path
